org.grouplens.lenskit.data.event

Class Like

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.event.Like
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Event

    public final class Like
extends java.lang.Object
implements Event, java.io.Serializable

    Generic interface representing a unary interaction. This provides a basic, generic representation of likes, clicks, purchases, and other unary interactions. Applications may want to implement their own events to represent such interactions.

    This class can be created with LikeBuilder or one of the factory methods create(long, long, long) and create(long, long).

    Since:
    2.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public long getTimestamp()
        Description copied from interface: Event

        Get the event timestamp. A timestamp of -1 indicates that the event has no timestamp; such events should generally be considered to happen infinitely long ago.

        Specified by:
